1045190.name: Naval Action - L'Hermione
1045190.description:
Naval Action - L'Hermione

This is a premium consumable ship. It is not refundable. You must have an appropriate rank to sail it fully crewed.

Hermione is Concorde-class frigate. She ferried General Lafayette to the United States in 1780 for support to the Americans in the American Revolutionary War.

It's a beautiful ship, one of the most agile and powerful in its class.

About premium consumable vessels.

Premium ships cannot be captured by players or traded. You can request this vessel from the admiralty once a day as long as you don't have the same vessel already in your docks. You will be able to request the frame and planking wood type when ordering a ship. Admiralty requests for this ship will be completed instantly.

Imported DLC ships allows you to ignore hauling of resources and crafting receiving the ship for free: Just buy guns, repairs, and other consumables and you are good to go. If you don't plan to use the ship for combat - for example for hauling - you don't even need guns, repairs and consumables.

DLC will appear in your redeemable list after you dock to any port. You must have an appropriate rank to sail it fully crewed.
